subject: Concussions
Football
lead_paragraph: Jets’ Coach Eric Mangini acknowledged that the receiver Laveranues Coles has a concussion, his third head injury in less than two years, and safety Eric Smith suffered his second in three weeks.
snippet: Jets’ Coach Eric Mangini acknowledged that the receiver Laveranues Coles has a concussion, his third head injury in less than two years, and safety Eric Smith suffered his second in three weeks.
